description:
Williams Newman Williams, PLLC, is a national law firm with an office in Los Angeles, California. We are a comprehensive personal injury practice capable of handling even the most complex cases effectively and efficiently.

Our other offices are in Little Rock, Arkansas, and Jackson, Mississippi. Every client we accept at every location gets the benefit of our entire network's experience, knowledge and skill.

A Dedicated Personal Injury Firm

Our law firm handles many types of personal injury cases. Some are unfortunately common, such as car accidents; slips and falls; nursing home accidents, neglect and abuse; animal bites and construction accidents. We also accept complex cases, such as aviation accidents, toxic mold, toxic torts, birth injuries, wrongful death, medical malpractice and more.

A Successful Track Record
We have recovered millions of dollars on behalf of our clients. We believe that our success comes from a comprehensive understanding of both the technical and human signs of personal injury law.

Many of our attorneys have extensive experience, but we also have a diverse set of backgrounds. Many of us have worked defending insurance companies, so we understand both sides of these cases. We also have trial experience. We are willing to take these matters as far as necessary to get a good deal.

An Open Door

Williams Newman Williams, PLLC, is a law firm that wants to help. That is why we offer free consultations, accept credit card payments and provide virtual appointments. Everyone should have access to quality legal representation if they want to fight for what they truly deserve.
